name: (Full Options) Telli Short Sleeve Windbreaker (Bulk price)
description:
About this item

  • Multi functional and on trend, The Telli Short Sleeve Windbreaker jacket is a every season hit for sure.
  • Available in 6 different colors for you to choose from.
  • This Windbreaker Jacket has front patch pockets along with straps.
  • This top was designed for the Dreamer making moves on the go.
  • Fabric Details: Shell-100% polyester, Lining-100%Cotton
  • This garment has no stretch
